description.p: Obsidian Level Maker is a community continuation of OBLIGE Level Maker, originally by Andrew Apted. It generates random levels that are (hopefully) fun to play. The following games are currently supported: - Doom 1/The Ultimate Doom/Freedoom Phase 1 - Doom 2/Freedoom Phase 2 - Final Doom - Heretic - Hexen - Chex Quest 3 - HacX 1.2 - Harmony - Strife - Wolfenstein 3-D - Spear of Destiny - Super Noah's Ark 3-D
